headline: Should Travelers’ Strong 2025 Earnings and Bigger Buyback Plan Require Action From Travelers (TRV) Investors?
summary: The Travelers Companies reported past full-year 2025 results with revenue of US$48.83 billion and net income of US$6.29 billion, alongside affirming a regular quarterly dividend of US$1.10 per share payable on March 31, 2026. The company also completed a long-running share repurchase program totaling over US$44.05 billion and expanded its buyback authorization by an additional US$5.00 billion, highlighting an ongoing commitment to returning capital to shareholders. We’ll now consider how...

headline: A Look At Travelers (TRV) Valuation After Strong Q4 Earnings Beat And Improved Profitability
summary: Travelers Companies (TRV) is back in focus after a strong Q4 earnings beat, with profit ahead of Wall Street expectations, supported by disciplined underwriting, lower catastrophe losses, and higher net investment income. See our latest analysis for Travelers Companies. The strong Q4 update, together with a higher full year net income of US$6,288m and an expanded US$5,000m buyback authorization, has coincided with a 6.3% 90 day share price return and a 17.9% 1 year total shareholder return,...
